text: Eduardo Verchez García (2 May 1929 – 20 June 2019), popularly known as Eddie Garcia or Manoy, was a Filipino movie actor and movie director. He appeared in over 600 movies and TV shows as of 2019. He is also the only person in the Philippines inducted into the FAMAS Hall of Fame in three categories: Best Actor, Best Supporting Actor and Best Director. On 8 June 2019, Garcia suffered a neck fracture after having a fall and was hospitalised in Manila. He was soon moved to Makati, where he died on 20 June 2019. He was 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2019 deaths Category:People from Bicol Region Category:Filipino movie actors Category:Filipino movie directors Category:Sorsogon Category:Filipino television actors
title: Eddie Garcia
